description: This file defines a React functional component named HeaderActions, which provides UI elements for search, user sign-in/sign-out, and note creation within a notes management application.

methods.name: HeaderActions
methods.description: A React component that renders action controls such as search input, sign in/out buttons, and create note button.

methods.name: handleSignOut
methods.description: An async function that handles user sign-out process, updating user state and managing loading state.
